title: Ravyn Lenae Announces Autumn 2025 Tour
description: The Chicago R&B artist will perform across the United States, Europe, and the United Kingdom
author: Walden Green
excerpt: The Chicago R&B artist will perform across the United States, Europe, and the United Kingdom
text: Ravyn Lenae has announced her second tour in as many years. This autumn, the Chicago R&B artist will perform across the U.S., U.K., and Europe. The run of dates kicks off October 6 at Los Angeles Wiltern Theatre, and will wrap up exactly a month later in Cologne, Germany.Lenae shared her sophomore album Bird’s Eye last year. She’s set to perform at Lollapalooza 2025 this summer, and, following her headlining shows, will join Sabrina Carpenter for the Toronto and L.A. stops of her extended Short n’ Sweet Tour. Find Lenae’s complete touring schedule below.Revisit Eric Torres’ interview “Ravyn Lenae Is Making Timeless R&B at Her Own Pace.”All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Ravyn Lenae has announced her second tour in as many years. This autumn, the Chicago R&B artist will perform across the U.S., U.K., and Europe. The run of dates kicks off October 6 at Los Angeles Wiltern Theatre, and will wrap up exactly a month later in Cologne, Germany.

Lenae shared her sophomore album Bird’s Eye last year. She’s set to perform at Lollapalooza 2025 this summer, and, following her headlining shows, will join Sabrina Carpenter for the Toronto and L.A. stops of her extended Short n’ Sweet Tour. Find Lenae’s complete touring schedule below.

Revisit Eric Torres’ interview “Ravyn Lenae Is Making Timeless R&B at Her Own Pace.”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
